DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer age 18 Significant abnormality health history questionnaire result blood test Pregnant nursing mother Participation another research study within past six week felt Principal Investigator incompatible study Severe infection past two month Immune disorder , use medication alter immune system function A medical mental health find show inability go procedure Body mass index ( BMI ) great 29 % Chronic back pain , sciatica , compression fracture spine Positive test result viral infection : Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , HIV ( AIDS )
